Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 12 Minutes

Timer 8 minutes Preheat ninja to 500°
Put ½ bunch Asparagus
Brush with Olive Oil
Timer 4 minutes Cook Asparagus in oven @ 500°
Season with Dash Seasoning
